doc.field: The Heidelbergh Catechism, or Method of Instruction, in the Christian Religion, as the same is taught in the Reformed Churches and Schools of Holland. Translated for the Use of the Reformed Protestant Dutch Church, of the City of New-York (New York: John Holt)
